title: Ford China venture to recall 220,000 SUVs over risk of fuel leak
text:
Ford China venture to recall 220,000 SUVs over risk of fuel leak 
Published By: Reuters - Today 
BEIJING (Reuters) - Ford Motor Co's China joint venture will recall roughly 220,000 Kuga sports-utility vehicles (SUVs) over potential fuel ...
